Subject: Government
Description: The insolvency of the Albanian power sector is quite severe.

Subject: Government
Description: It stems in large part from the performance of the distribution company OSHEE since there are excessive technical and non-technical losses in the distribution sector and inadequate collection of cash from customer bills.

Subject: Government
Description: In principle, this problem can be addressed by significant financial injections from the Government, by policy and other reforms to improve the financial performance of sector entities or by a combination of these two approaches.
